import React from 'react'; import VideoEmbed from '../components/VideoEmbed'; const PublicPortfolio = ({ items, setView, isAdmin }) => { // Sort items by creation date to ensure the first item added is always the hero const sortedItems = [...items].sort((a, b) => (a.createdAt?.seconds || 0) - (b.createdAt?.seconds || 0)); // The first item in the sorted list is the showreel, the rest are projects const heroItem = sortedItems.length > 0 ? sortedItems[0] : null; const projectItems = sortedItems.slice(1); return (
{/* 1. Hero Section (Showcase Reel) */}
{/* Decorative background elements */}

The Storyteller, The Editor.

Crafting compelling narratives from raw footage. I make videos *move*.

{heroItem ? (
) : (

No Showreel Set. Add items in the Admin Panel.

)} View My Work
{/* Divider for visual separation */}
{/* 2. About Section */}

About Me

I am a professional video editor with 5+ years of experience specializing in high-impact commercial content and cinematic storytelling. My passion lies in rhythm and pacing, ensuring every cut serves the narrative and keeps the viewer engaged. I'm proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and After Effects.

From short-form social media ads to feature-length documentary trailers, I focus on delivering polished, ready-to-publish media. Let's create something unforgettable together.

{/* Divider */}
{/* 3. Portfolio / Work Section */}

Selected Work

{projectItems.length > 0 ? ( projectItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

{item.type === 'youtube' ? 'YouTube' : 'Google Drive'}

{item.description}

)) ) : (

No additional projects found. Add more in the Admin Panel!

)}
{/* Divider */}
{/* 4. Contact Section */}

Let's Create Together

Ready to bring your vision to life? I'm available for freelance projects.

your.email@example.com
{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} [Your Name] Films. All Rights Reserved.

); }; export default PublicPortfolio;
